features: 【Kazazoo Powerful Steamer for Clothes 】A short ironing time can perfectly remove wrinkles.Effortlessly remove wrinkles with our powerful 1000W steamer that heats up quickly and delivers strong steam output, saving you time and making your life easier.The water tank holds up to 150ml of tap water, could be continuous ironing 15 minutes!

Advanced 360° Anti-splash Technology: Innovative electronic pump system and optimized hot pipe design. Our products work perfectly even when upside down, without spitting or leaking. Say goodbye to the outdated 45° sputter limit and enjoy a higher level of safety and convenience.

Upgrade Convenience: The newly upgraded power cord grows to an impressive 9.2 feet, there's no more scrambling around to find an outlet. Iron bedding, tablecloths, curtains, plush toys, and more with ease and safety. Uncover infinite possibilities for your home.

Fast Heating & Long Lasting: Just push the only switch and wait less than 25 seconds. It will deliver 10 minutes of steady steam. In a time crunch, it ensures your garments always stay in their best shape.
WARRANTY AND TRUST: Refund within 30 days is provided by us. All products enjoy a three-year after sale with 24-hour customer service and lifelong technical support. We always serve you for the best!

Portable & Lightweight Mini Travel Size Steamer for Clothes In countries with 120V electrical circuits, it is your ultimate choice for both home and traveling ironing needs.

What is the applicable voltage for this product? (Important: Please check the voltage before use) This product is suitable for 110-120V. Suitable for countries such as the USA, Mexico, Japan, etc. But not suitable for countries in the Europe area. Can I add a plug adapter to use this product in a 220V country? Unfortunately, plug adapters cannot change the voltage, so this is not possible. Can I install the brush accessories while using the product? No, it's not recommended. The nozzle panel gets very hot during use, and installing the brush attachment could lead to burns. It's safe to install the attachment only before heating or after cooling down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best steamer for Wrinkle-Free Perfection
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this incredible Steamer for Travel to iron out the wrinkles on my wedding dress, and I couldn't be happier with the results! This compact and lightweight steamer proved to be an absolute lifesaver during the final preparations for my big day.One of the standout features of this steamer is its portability. It's compact enough to fit into my suitcase without taking up much space, making it an ideal travel companion. As someone who needed a quick and efficient solution for my wedding dress, this steamer exceeded my expectations.The steamer worked like a charm, effortlessly removing wrinkles and leaving my dress looking flawless. Its fast heating capability ensured that I didn't waste any time waiting for it to be ready. I appreciated the user-friendly design, as it was easy to handle and maneuver around the delicate fabric of my dress.What impressed me the most was the gentle yet effective performance. I was initially concerned about using a steamer on my wedding dress, but this one proved to be a game-changer. It handled the delicate material with care, and I didn't have to worry about any damage or issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steady steamer for travel
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Steady Steamer for travel. This portable steamer is a game-changer for anyone who wants to look sharp and wrinkle-free while on the go. First, the compact design of the Steady Steamer is perfect for travelers. It fits snugly in my suitcase without taking up much space, and it's incredibly lightweight, so it doesn't add unnecessary weight to my luggage. I also appreciate the included travel pouch, which keeps it safe and organized during transit. When it comes to performance, this little steamer packs a punch. It heats up quickly, and within minutes, I'm ready to steam my clothes. The steam flow is consistent and powerful enough to smooth out even the toughest wrinkles. I was pleasantly surprised at how effective it is on a variety of fabrics, from delicate silk to stubborn cotton.The Steady Steamer is also easy to use. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, and the water tank is simple to fill. Plus, the transparent water reservoir lets me see exactly how much water is left, so I'm never caught off guard.

reviews.reviewText: The size is perfect and it really does the jobs! Really easy to use and convenient. Easy to carry around for travels. Definitely recommended!

reviews.reviewText: Needed for my son’s wedding and it did the job. It’s a slow process but gets it done

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, very convenient
reviews.reviewText: I have a regular steamer at home but it’s too big and heavy to carry around. This steamer is great for traveling and for office use. It’s small and light, and the water container can hold enough water for steaming clothes. There is also another header that comes with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dangerous and will burn your hand
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to steam the table throw for travel conferences and events. I was past the return window by the time the team used it, so unfortunately I can’t return or get a refund. But what I can do is warn you not to waste your money. It’s not only a poor product, it’s dangerous. I had it plugged in for about 2 mins and when I went to pick it up the steam burned my hand at just a slight touch. Do not buy this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leak Free Garment Steamer
reviews.reviewText: This garment steamer is great. The water chamber is leak free. Out of 1 to 10, 10 bring the best, I give it a 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: El tamaño es excelente, muy fácil de usar pero para ayudar a las arrugas hay que tomar mucho tiempo y repasarlo varias veces al terminar ya que al rato vuelves a ver de nuevo la arruga en la tela.

Una PORQUERÍA! Al llegar la utilicé 2 veces y más o menos hizo su función, me la llevé de viaje (bien empacada y enrollada con abrigos gruesos de invierno para su protección)y al comenzar a utilizarla NO FUNCIONÓ correctamente, se sobre calentó, se le salía el agua un poco y no sacó vapor, la tuve que tirar.
